name: 李俊賢
objective: Matlab and Simulink, dynamic systems modeling, time-domain analysis, root locus analysis, frequency-domain analysis, PID controller design, lag-lead compensator design, case studies, and special topics.
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction
Week 2: Matlab Tutorial
Week 3: Simulink Tutorial
Week 4: Modeling and Simulation
Week 5: Time-Domain Analysis
Week 6: Root Locus Analysis
Week 7: Frequency-Domain Analysis
Week 8: PID Controller Design
Week 9: Midterm Exam
Week 10: Delta HMI
Week 11: Delta PLC (1/2)
Week 12: Delta PLC (2/2)
Week 13: Delta VFD
Week 14: Delta ASDA (1/2)
Week 15: Delta ASDA (2/2)
Week 16: Delta Integrated Applications (1/2)
Week 17: Delta Integrated Applications (2/2)
Week 18: Final Exam
materials:
1)　　Norman S. Nise, Control Systems Engineering, 5-8/e, John Wiley & Sons, 2008-2019 (滄海圖書代理)。
2)　　李宜達編著，控制系統設計與模擬：使用MATLAB/SIMULINK (修訂八版)，全華圖書、2011。(舊版二手書亦可，例如2009的修訂六版)
3)　　Delta Electronics, Operation and Application Manuals. [Online]. Available: http://www.deltaww.com/ia/downloads.
